column1:
https://www.eurojobs.com/austria/job/15874195/team-lead-b2b-marketing-m-w-d-wien.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=1,Team Lead B2B Marketing (m/w/d), Wien,10.12.2020,Information Technology,Wien, Austria,Information Technology,Vollzeit | Berlin, Dresden, Essen oder Wien | ab sofort,

Team Lead B2B Marketing (m/w/d), Wien
einem Team Lead B2B Marketing (w/m/d) für unseren Standort in Berlin, Dresden, Wien oder Essen.

Unsere Marketingaktivitäten im B2B-Bereich liegen voll in deiner Hand. Mit deinem Verständnis für den Einzelhandel sowie deiner Vernetzung in der Medienlandschaft trägst du maßgebend zur strategischen Ausrichtung und Weiterentwicklung unseres Bereiches bei und sorgst für einen professionellen Außenauftritt, sowohl online als auch offline. Dein Ziel? Unsere Sichtbarkeit und Marke bei unseren internationalen Handelskunden stärken!
Dabei stehst du unserem 6-köpfigen B2B-Marketing-Team als Coach mit Rat & Tat zur Seite.

Vollzeit | Berlin, Dresden, Essen oder Wien | ab sofort

DEINE MISSION BEI UNS

column2: • Inbound Strategieerstellung und Koordination aller internationalen B2B Aktivitäten.
• strategische Weiterentwicklung des Bereichs unter Beachtung der Unternehmensziele.?
• Du führst und coachst dein standortübergreifendes, internationales Team aus Deutschland, Österreich & Bulgarien.
• Du trägst die Verantwortung für das Budget inkl. Vertrags- & Preisverhandlungen mit Dienstleistern, B2B-Controlling, Personal-Budgetplanungen.

column1: Kundenbindung und -gewinnung (Inbound) im gesamten Marketing-Mix

column2: • Entwicklung und Steuerung von B2B-Online-Konzepten zur Unterstützung der Vertriebsaktivitäten.
• Planung, Koordination und Weiterentwicklung der gesamten PR-Aktivitäten.
• Projektierung von Messeauftritten und Speakerslots auf relevanten B2B-Veranstaltungen.
• Abgeschlossenes Studium im Umfeld Marketing bzw. Wirt­schaft oder eine ähn­liche Aus­bildung in diesem Bereich.
• Mindestens 3 Jahre Berufserfahrung im B2B-Marketing sowie erste Erfahrung in der Mitarbeiterführung.
• in strategischen B2B-Marketing Themen z.B. Presse, Content Creation und Marfktforschung.
• Hohe Kennzahlenaffinität sowie sicherer Umgang mit Analysetools.
• Du überzeugst uns mit deinem selbstsicheren Auftreten, Eloquenz sowie mit deinem Verhandlungsgeschick.
• Du bist ein richtiges Kommunikationstalent, vor allem in deutscher, aber auch in englischer Sprache.
• Leanes, agiles und hochdynamisches Arbeitsumfeld mit abwechslungsreichen Tätigkeiten
• Verantwortung und viel Raum für Kreativität und die Mitgestaltung unseres gemeinsamen Weges
• Kontinuierliche Weiterentwicklung durch regelmäßiges Feedback, Workshops und einem individuellen Karriereplan
• Komplett flexible Vertrauensarbeitszeiten, Mobile-Working-Regelungen sowie die Möglichkeit auf ein Sabbatical
• Modernstes technisches Equipment - auch für dein Homeoffice
• Eine diverse und inklusive Unternehmenskultur mit flachen Hierarchien sowie ein offenes und kollegiales Miteinander
• Familienfreundlichkeit - bring Kind und Hund auch gerne mal mit ins Office
• Modernes und verspieltes Office im Zentrum der Stadt

column1:
https://www.eurojobs.com/austria/job/15866971/key-account-manager-m-w-d-wien.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=5,Key Account Manager (m/w/d), Wien,07.12.2020,Information Technology,Wien, Austria,Information Technology,,

Key Account Manager (m/w/d), Wien

column4: wogibtswas.at ist das marktführende Online Portal zum Suchen und Finden von Aktionen & Flugblättern in deiner Nähe. Die Offerista Group Austria GmbH ist ein Unternehmen der Offerista Group mit Sitz in Wien. Zur Verstärkung unseres Teams suchen wir ab sofort eine/n

column1: Deine Rolle ist es, gemeinsam mit dem Team, Neukunden zu akquirieren und bestehende Kundenbeziehungen im digitalen Handelsmarketing auszubauen. Du betreust eigenständig eine Vielzahl an Kunden und es steht Dir ein ausgereiftes Produktportfolio zur Verfügung. Deine Aufgabe ist es, dem Kunden mit Deiner Online-Expertise beratend zur Seite zu stehen und unsere Produkte zu verkaufen.

column2: • Als Key Accounter trägst Du durch Deine Verkaufsstärke nachhaltig zum Wachstum von wogibtswas.at bei. Der Schwerpunkt deiner Tätigkeit liegt im B2B-Direktkundenverkauf. Dazu gehört:
• Betreuung und Aufbau bestehender Kundenbeziehungen.
• Neukundenakquise, sowohl am Telefon als auch bei persönlichen Terminen.
• Terminvereinbarung, Angebotslegung & Kundenberatung bis zum Abschluss.
• Ausbau neuer Branchen und pro-aktive Analyse von Kundenpotentialen
• Aktive Teilnahme am Ausbau der Produktpalette.
• Mind. 3 Jahre nachweislich erfolgreiche Erfahrung im Direktkundenverkauf
• Online-Affinität ist wünschenswert, noch wichtiger aber ist Dein Verkaufstalent.
• Die Neukundenakquise bereitet Dir Freude und Du entwickelst daraus nachhaltige Kundenbeziehungen.
• Du bist ein Teamplayer und es motiviert Dich gemeinsam erfolgreich zu sein.
• Du überzeugst durch Dein authentisches, kontaktfreudiges Auftreten, als auch durch Deine Verhandlungsstärke.
• Führerschein Klasse B ist essentiell, damit Du zu Kundenterminen fahren kannst.
• Gute bis sehr gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift.
• Du bist Teil eines eingespielten, motivierten und erfolgsorientierten Teams, wo der gemeinsame Erfolg im Vordergrund steht.
• Du verkaufst ein nachweislich erfolgreiches Produkt mit zufriedenen Kunden und einer enormen Reichweite.
• Du arbeitest in einem internationalen, leanen Umfeld mit fachlichen und persönlichen Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten durch unseren Karriereplan.
• Feedbackkultur sowie gegenseitiger Austausch, um voneinander zu lernen, wird groß geschrieben.
• Teamevents (z.B. Rafting, Tischtennis, Hochseilgarten).
• Übe deine Geschicklichkeit mit unserer Dartscheibe.
• Modernes, Wohlfühl-Office in Wien-Mitte (1030).
• Das Jahresbruttogehalt liegt bei mind. 38.000 € + variabler Bonus (IT-KKV). Das tatsächliche Gehalt wird entsprechend deiner Qualifikation und einschlägiger Erfahrung festgelegt.

column1: WERDE TEIL UNSERES TEAMS UND GESTALTE MIT UNS

Wir sind Visionäre, Bessermacher und Weiterdenker. Voller Hingabe gestalten wir die digitale Einkaufswelt von Morgen. Im Raum DACH bereits als Marktführer im digitalen Handelsmarketing bekannt, verschaffen unsere hochmodernen Produkte dem Einzelhandel digitale Reichweite und Ladenbesuche. Das Erreichte erfüllt uns mit Stolz, das Künftige spornt uns an. Wir sind Offerista - und wir sind auf der Suche nach hellen Köpfen, die uns noch besser machen.

column1:
https://www.eurojobs.com/austria/job/15862349/bi-support-manager-scrum-master-sap-bi-innsbruck.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=5,BI Support Manager - Scrum Master - SAP BI, Innsbruck,03.12.2020,Retail,Innsbruck, Austria,Retail,BI Support Manager – Scrum Master,

BI Support Manager - Scrum Master - SAP BI, Innsbruck

Join an international business as a BI Support Manager, where you will support the global user base with all BI and Analytics tools enterprise wide. The role will also play an important role in being the Scrum Master for the Data team, which comprises of Data Scientists and Data Engineers, working on improving the process of delivering new data products for the business.

The role will be highly dynamic, covering a wide array of technologies and business departments, so being agile will be key. It likely will suit someone with an interest in bringing calm to chaos, introducing process and best practice to deliver efficient solutions. With thousands of users across the group, it will be rare to have two days the same, with new requests coming daily. You will have an opportunity to build relationships across the business with a diverse set of stakeholders, while also getting exposure to advanced analytics as well.
* Provide day to day support for the BI products, mainly 2nd and 3rd line
* Partner with the super user community to train them and develop their skills, which will ensure they provide 1st line support for you
* Ensure users can access the BI and Analytics tools, support setup guide for new users
* Develop skills in end users to use self service BI and data discovery
* Engage with the end user community to collect change requests and improvements for the BI domain
* Support the department lead with strategy for the BI and Analytics team
Secondary focus – Scrum Master/ Agile Coach for Data Analytics team
* Be the champion for the Agile framework within the business, promoting best practice and guide teams on the continuous improvement approach
* Actively facilitate sprints by identifying issues that may derail the sprint and work to ensure collaboration across the teams
* Support the various Product Owners to identify ideal pace for teams, balancing quality, speed, and importantly team morale
* Coordinate with the broader Agile champions across the business as the Data Analytics lead
* Improve processes around the BI and Analytics department
* Coordinate with Product Owners for their input and translate this into action while preserving best practice
* 5+ years of professional experience in the field of BI and Analytics
* Expertise within the SAP BI stack, including both front end (SAP BO) and back end DWH (SAP BW)
* Ideally strong knowledge of Data Visualisation tools such as Tableau, Power BI, Qlik, or similar
* Understand Agile methodologies and ideally Scrum Master certified
* Comfortable with defining and modelling processes, creating templates and best practice
* Must have very strong communication and leadership skills, both in support and project environments
* Experience in training diverse user bases both in person and digitally
* Ideally a self-starter, a person who identifies opportunities to improve the team and themselves, promoting ideas actively within the organization

This role will offer a great springboard opportunity within the organization to gain a broad understanding of the business across all departments, building relationships with a wide variety of stakeholders. Alongside this, you will not only work with classic BI products, but you will also work extensively with modern Data Analytics teams, building skills in these areas and having many opportunities for further learning in new technologies and best practices.
For more information on this and related opportunities, get in contact with Geoff Coleman from SystemsAccountants on Geoff@systemsaccountants.com

column1:
https://www.eurojobs.com/austria/job/15860687/global-medical-advisor-immunology-vienna.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=5,Global Medical Advisor Immunology, Vienna,02.12.2020,Healthcare,Vienna, Austria,Healthcare,My client, a family owned company with critical care and immunology portfolio, is looking for a new addition to their Medical affairs team with a global function.,

Global Medical Advisor Immunology, Vienna

column4: My client, a family owned company with critical care and immunology portfolio, is looking for a new addition to their Medical affairs team with a global function.

column1: You will be joining a reliable and well-reputable employer with a large, state of the art production site in Vienna.
Having a good pipeline of upcoming products among several well established drugs, my client is able to provide a long-term perspective for the right candidate in this role.
Besides flexible working time and a compensation according market standard, you will also be welcomed into an international, friendly team, which you will be able to learn from.
In this role, as a Medical Advisor for immunology, you will be responsible for:
* Managing the publication process in relation to clinical studies
* Bear responsibility for the literature database and revise and compile outgoing documents
* Answering medical enquiries and being a point of contact for medical questions for other departments
* Project management of Phase IV clinical projects
* Experience working in the area of immunology
* Knowledge of GCP and good scientific writing and database research skills
* Fluent English, German is a plus
In this role, you will be responsible for a wide range of tasks and will be able to gain experience in more than one function so things will never get boring.
You will be given a high degree of responsibility and will be allowed to work independently.
Salary: According to experience and skills can vary between 50 000 – 70 000 euro
Start date: as soon as possible
If this description addresses you, apply here or get in touch with Michaela Plamenova via
NonStop is one of the largest and fastest growing specialised recruitment companies in Europe. We

recruitment industry. With offices located in Switzerland, Luxembourg, the UK, the Czech Republic
and more, we hold labour leasing licences across Europe. Please visit our website for a full list of the niche markets we cover.

column1:
https://www.eurojobs.com/belgium/job/15872385/international-market-research-strong-product-line-antwerp.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=1,International Market Research - Strong Product Line, Antwerp,10.12.2020,Healthcare,Antwerp, Belgium,Healthcare,International Market Research Professional,

International Market Research - Strong Product Line, Antwerp

Our client is searching for an International Market Research Professional. You will be working in a small (about 100), family owned company which has a range of products for wound and skin care. They have lots of new products in the pipeline as well as research cooperation agreements in the US and Europe.
If you want to work in a company that offers a flexible work system, great colleagues and a good salary package then you’re in the right place.
Depending on your location, the role can be based either in Germany, Luxembourg, the UK or Belgium.

A key part of the job is setting up the international market research department, so you will have no shortage of responsibility straight away. You will need to be strong with data analysis and giving presentations to upper management, whom you will be in close contact with in this role. You will also be expected to travel both domestically and internationally.
* Develop, analyse and implement data collection from internal and external market research
* Create monthly, quarterly and annual reports
* Perform research and source secondary research
* Give customer insights (physicians, wound carers, nurses, pharmacists and consumers)
* Foster the flow of information between marketing, sales, finance and medical
* Around 5 years of experience, pharmaceutical experience is a big plus
* Experience in wound care or dermatology is a big plus
* Excellent with Excel and Power Point
* Google Analytic skills will be helpful
* English is a must, German is advantageous

If this job appeals to you please apply here or send your CV to me, Jared Holmes, on the NonStop Consulting website. If you are not available but you know someone that would be interested, please forward this to them and help the people in your network.

NonStop is one of the largest and fastest growing specialized life-sciences & Med-tech recruitment companies in Europe. We are proud members of the APSCo life sciences group who ensure we meet the highest quality standards within the recruitment industry. Our offices are located in the UK, Luxemburg, Switzerland, US, Romania and the Czech Republic. Please visit our website for a full list of the niche markets we cover.
* Around 5 years of experience, pharmaceutical experience is a big plus
* Experience in wound care or dermatology is a big plus
* Excellent with Excel and Power Point
* Google Analytic skills will be helpful
* English is a must, German is advantageous

Manufacturing Technology Engineer

The Manufacturing Technology Engineer will support the R&D department focussing on the development of bioreactors. The company is currently support big pharma companies in the search to develop a COVID-19 vaccine.
Contract length: Until August 2021 – potential extension
Type: Temporary contract via external payroll company
Salary: Based on 40 hours per week €3900 gross p/m
The R&D department is responsible for the developments of bioreactors and mixers in multidisciplinary teams.
• Support design assembly and manufacturing tasks
For this role, we’re looking for someone with:
• Normally this roles requires 4+ years’ experience in Product/Process engineering
• Experience with Lean Manufacturing (certificate is a bonus)
• Fluent in English, Dutch and/or French is a bonus
This projects allows you to support the search for a COVID-19 vaccine! The contract is set up via our local payroll partner.
Interested in this project? Get in touch for more information!

Disclaimer: Amoria Bond operates as an employment agency and employment business. No terminology in this advert is intended to discriminate on the grounds of age or experience, and we confirm that we are happy to accept applications from persons of any age or experience for this role.

* Experience with Lean Manufacturing (certificate is a bonus)
* Fluent in English, Dutch and/or French is a bonus

column1:
https://www.eurojobs.com/belgium/job/15869899/gestionnaire-de-projet-oprationnel-bruxelles.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=1,Gestionnaire de projet opérationnel, Bruxelles,09.12.2020,Other,Bruxelles, Belgium,Other,Le (la) assistant (e) de projet opérationnel sera placé (e) sous la responsabilité du chef du projet chef et travaillera également selon ses instructions. Il / elle évoluera au sein d’une équipe internationale.,

Gestionnaire de projet opérationnel, Bruxelles

column4:
Le (la) assistant (e) de projet opérationnel sera placé (e) sous la responsabilité du chef du projet chef et travaillera également selon ses instructions. Il / elle évoluera au sein d’une équipe internationale.
Il/elle aura pour mission de :
  • Soutenir le chef du projet dans la gestion opérationnelle quotidienne du projet ;
  • Soutenir la préparation du plan de travail annuel, des rapports annuels et des rapports trimestriels et autres rapports et notes officielles ;
  • Gérer, surveiller et rendre compte de la planification et de l'allocation des ressources ;
  • Animer le réseau des partenaires du projet :
    • contribuer à la gouvernance du projet, notamment au niveau de l’engagement des partenaires
    • maintenir l’ensemble des partenaires informés de l’avancée du projet
  • Préparer et assister aux réunions contractuelles et en cas d'absence du chef de projet, représenter le projet ;
  • Contribution à la mise en place et la gestion du système suivi et évaluation du projet ;
  • Gérer directement l'équipe des finances et de l'administration.

Qualification et compétences
  • Bac +5, Master 2 – (école supérieure de commerce, instituts d’études politiques, gestion, administration publique, coopération internationale) ;
  • Maîtrise d’Excel, Word, et connaissance d’un logiciel de gestion de projet et de comptabilité ;
  • Français et anglais professionnel indispensable ;
  • Capacités de communication et d’expression orale (FR et ENG) ;
  • Excellente capacité rédactionnelle (FR et ENG) ;
  • Compréhension et adaptation à différents environnements institutionnels et capacité à dialoguer avec une multitude d’acteurs tant publics que privés ;
  • Orientation vers le résultat ;
  • Sens de l’organisation : aptitude à planifier des taches, considère les différentes possibilités avant d’entreprendre quelque chose ; établir des priorités parmi plusieurs taches ;
  • Sens de la négociation : aptitude à savoir écouter pour récolter les informations nécessaires et à comprendre l’autre partie en ayant pour but de trouver une solution ou un arrangement satisfaisant pour les deux parties ;
  • Maîtrise de l’information : capacité à rechercher, comprendre, analyser et restituer des informations à différents interlocuteurs.
Expériences professionnelles

column1:
• Minimum 5 ans d’expériences professionnelles dans la gestion de projets impliquant plusieurs partenaires ou parties prenantes ;
  • Bonne capacité de planification ;
  • Expérience avérée de travail en équipé et de gestion d’équipe ;
  • Gestion de partenaires institutionnels et privés dans le contexte d’un projet complexe (au moins 6 partenaires) : maitrise d’outils de gestion de partenaires et partage de l’information ;
  • Bonne connaissance des outils de suivi et évaluation ;
  • Bonne connaissance du paysage institutionnel français et européen dans le domaine de la lutte et la prévention de la radicalisation serait un plus ;
  • Connaissance des grands enjeux liés à la prévention de la radicalisation en Europe serait un plus.

column5: Gestionnaire de projet opérationnel, Bruxelles

column4:
Le (la) assistant (e) de projet opérationnel sera placé (e) sous la responsabilité du chef du projet chef et travaillera également selon ses instructions. Il / elle évoluera au sein d’une équipe internationale.
Il/elle aura pour mission de :
  • Soutenir le chef du projet dans la gestion opérationnelle quotidienne du projet ;
  • Soutenir la préparation du plan de travail annuel, des rapports annuels et des rapports trimestriels et autres rapports et notes officielles ;
  • Gérer, surveiller et rendre compte de la planification et de l'allocation des ressources ;
  • Animer le réseau des partenaires du projet :
    • contribuer à la gouvernance du projet, notamment au niveau de l’engagement des partenaires
    • maintenir l’ensemble des partenaires informés de l’avancée du projet
  • Préparer et assister aux réunions contractuelles et en cas d'absence du chef de projet, représenter le projet ;
  • Contribution à la mise en place et la gestion du système suivi et évaluation du projet ;
  • Gérer directement l'équipe des finances et de l'administration.

Qualification et compétences
  • Bac +5, Master 2 – (école supérieure de commerce, instituts d’études politiques, gestion, administration publique, coopération internationale) ;
  • Maîtrise d’Excel, Word, et connaissance d’un logiciel de gestion de projet et de comptabilité ;
  • Français et anglais professionnel indispensable ;
  • Capacités de communication et d’expression orale (FR et ENG) ;
  • Excellente capacité rédactionnelle (FR et ENG) ;
  • Compréhension et adaptation à différents environnements institutionnels et capacité à dialoguer avec une multitude d’acteurs tant publics que privés ;
  • Orientation vers le résultat ;
  • Sens de l’organisation : aptitude à planifier des taches, considère les différentes possibilités avant d’entreprendre quelque chose ; établir des priorités parmi plusieurs taches ;
  • Sens de la négociation : aptitude à savoir écouter pour récolter les informations nécessaires et à comprendre l’autre partie en ayant pour but de trouver une solution ou un arrangement satisfaisant pour les deux parties ;
  • Maîtrise de l’information : capacité à rechercher, comprendre, analyser et restituer des informations à différents interlocuteurs.
Expériences professionnelles

column1:
• Minimum 5 ans d’expériences professionnelles dans la gestion de projets impliquant plusieurs partenaires ou parties prenantes ;
  • Bonne capacité de planification ;
  • Expérience avérée de travail en équipé et de gestion d’équipe ;
  • Gestion de partenaires institutionnels et privés dans le contexte d’un projet complexe (au moins 6 partenaires) : maitrise d’outils de gestion de partenaires et partage de l’information ;
  • Bonne connaissance des outils de suivi et évaluation ;
  • Bonne connaissance du paysage institutionnel français et européen dans le domaine de la lutte et la prévention de la radicalisation serait un plus ;
  • Connaissance des grands enjeux liés à la prévention de la radicalisation en Europe serait un plus.

https://www.eurojobs.com/belgium/job/15870012/clinical-trial-associate-high-growth-high-possibilities-ghent.html?searchId=1606174454.9407&page=1,Clinical Trial Associate: High Growth, High Possibilities, Ghent,09.12.2020,Healthcare,Ghent, Belgium,Healthcare,Clinical Trial Associate: Learn, Grow and Succeed!!,

Clinical Trial Associate: High Growth, High Possibilities, Ghent

column4: Clinical Trial Associate: Learn, Grow and Succeed!!

column1: If you're tired of working for large CRO's that treat you like a number instead of an individual, then keep on reading! Our client is a small CRO with less that 30 employees, they are searching for a CTA to join their team as soon as possible. They provide you with flexible working conditions with a motivated team that can provide you with close support. You should be a motivated junior person with just a few years of experience for this role.

Primarily your direct responsibility is to support the CTM with the coordination of logistical aspects of clinical trials by assisting with signature collection for CDA's, contracts, POs and insurance certificates in conjunction with CTM/Director Vendor Management.
* Develop and adapt documents to trial specific requirements in collaboration with the CTM
* May assist with the preparation of trial reports for the trial team and keeping them up-to-date
* Assists with organising (agenda, meeting minutes, follow-up on action items) trial specific meetings, including but not limited to trial team meetings, Investigator Meetings.

* Assists the CTM/COL to ensure that the essential Trial Documents at sponsor level are properly filed and made ready for archiving. Provides input to the other departments outside Clinical Operations to ensure that the needed documents are filed within the (e)TMF.
* Assists in (electronic) Trial Master File review (TMF) to confirm completeness and follow-up of findings
* The CTA helps the Head of Clinical Operations with:
* The development of template documents to be used within the Department
* The organization of the departmental meetings (agenda, meeting minutes, follow-up on action items)
Knowledgeable in Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and the applicable Standard Operation Procedures (SOPs):
Speaks and writes Dutch and English fluently
Knowledge of (e)TMF - Proficient in software applications such as Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint
Experience with tools and systems for managing clinical trials such as MS project, trial progress and metric systems, eCRF, IXRS.
Bachelor's degree or University degree - medical or para-medical or equivalent by experience

QA Manager – Innovative Software Releases, Leuven

column4: If you are passionate about medical software and would like to work for a big diagnostics player on the market, then this is your chance! This world-leader in diagnostics is looking for a QA Manager to lead the software team and support with multiple releases on the global market.

column1: This company has quite a lot of new software in the pipeline for their diagnostic products and your responsibility will be to manage and improve the quality management systems from concept to commercialisation. Better software is the future so you can play a key role and use your technical background.
* Conduct internal audits and assist external audits
* Develop and update design and process FMEA
* Manage a team of 2 QA Software Engineers
* Master Degree or PhD in life sciences or computer science or engineering, ideally Bioinformatics, Molecular Biology, Biotechnology,…
* Several years of experience in QA for the diagnostics or medical device industry
* Strong knowledge of ISO 13485, ISO 27001, ISO 14971, ISO 62304,…
* Experience with next generation sequencing assay workflow is a plus
* Working experience within a big global medical device group where you have more opportunity to grow and develop
* Market rate salary package with extra benefits

If this job appeals to you please apply here or send your CV on the NonStop Consulting website or contact me, Annelies De Baere, on my Linkedin. If you are not available but you know someone that would be interested, please forward this to them and help the people in your network.

NonStop is one of the largest and fastest growing specialised life-sciences & Med-tech recruitment companies in Europe. We are proud members of the APSCo life sciences group who ensure we meet the highest quality standards within the recruitment industry. Our offices are located in the UK, Switzerland, Romania, Luxembourg, US and the Czech Republic and we hold labour leasing licences for all EU8 countries. Please visit our website for a full list of the niche markets we cover.

column4: If you are passionate about medical software and would like to work for a big diagnostics player on the market, then this is your chance! This world-leader in diagnostics is looking for a QA Software Engineer to prepare new software releases.

column1: This company has quite a lot of new software in the pipeline for their diagnostic products and your responsibility will be to support the team in quality systems from concept to commercialisation. Better software is the future so you can play a key role and use your technical background.
* Conduct internal audits and assist external audits
* Ensure QMS is compliant with requirements and processes around QMS are implemented
* Manage and review software lifecycle process (risk analysis, design documents, software verification and validation)
* Organize quality related training and create quality awareness
* Master Degree or PhD in life sciences or computer science or engineering, ideally Bioinformatics, Molecular Biology, Biotechnology,…
* Some years of experience in QA for the diagnostics or medical device industry is a plus
* Strong knowledge of ISO 13485, ISO 27001, ISO 14971, ISO 62304,…
* Experience with next generation sequencing assay workflow is a plus
* Working experience within a big global medical device group where you have more opportunity to grow and develop
* If you do not have QA experience yet, this company will train you in this field
* Market rate salary package with extra benefits

If this job appeals to you please apply here or on the the NonStop Consulting website or send your CV to me, Annelies De Baere, on my Linkedin. If you are not available but you know someone that would be interested, please forward this to them and help the people in your network.
